channel.title: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?
channel.description:
This is the error when i try to make this shop: [code=java]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 101 at server.world.ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:141) at server.world.ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:45) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:69) Press any key to continue . . .[/code] or look at it like this: http://prntscr.com/dfqpr [size=14pt]by the way, this error is coming from my run.bat , my compiler works perfectly though.[/size] Steps i've done to make the shop: Made the shop in Shop.cfg (added items) Added the npc to actionhandler.java Added it to spawnnpc.cfg
[size=18pt]Still not working :([/size]

item.title: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @lostmyphat lostmyphat
item.description:
@lostmyphat wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:9, topic:453395”]There is a limit for the amount of shops you can have. 100 being the max.

Expand the array in shop handler.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?
item.description:
@308507631 wrote:

[quote=“joelandjacob, post:13, topic:453395”][quote author=308507631 link=topic=556240.msg4072364#msg4072364 date=1344470794]

There is a limit for the amount of shops you can have. 100 being the max.

Expand the array in shop handler.
[/quote] How do i do that? please thank you

You have to go to ShopHandler.java, and find the array in there. Replace the 100 limit to whatever amount between 100-200.[/quote] alright but what do i search for?

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?

item.title: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

it isn’t an array. it’s a constant variable, but the max-shops are set in an array by that constant variable and it’s set to 101 not 100.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?

item.title: Anyone know why my 101th shop isn't working?
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

[quote=“308507631, post:12, topic:453395”][quote author=AtomicInt_ link=topic=556240.msg4072358#msg4072358 date=1344470654]
There is a limit for the amount of shops you can have. 100 being the max.

Expand the array in shop handler.
[/quote] How do i do that? please thank you :)[/quote]

You have to go to ShopHandler.java, and find the array in there. Replace the 100 limit to whatever amount between 100-200.

Read full topic
